methods.name: filterText
javadoc: Filter a string, keeping only characters for which {@link #isAllowedCharacter(char)} returns true.
Note that this method strips line breaks, as {@link #isAllowedCharacter(char)} returns false for those.
@return A filtered version of the input string

methods.name: isAllowedChatCharacter
javadoc: Checks if the given character is allowed to be put into chat.
